description:
Private guest room with private bath, You do not need to cut through anyone else's space to get to guest room. No shared space. Private entrance off main hall/stairs of the building. Has a mini fridge, micro and coffee maker.

**Super Value on a Really Nice, Comfortable, Tastefully decorated guest room, Clean, w/ full private bath available for your long or short term stay! Why stay in an overpriced hotel???!!
